title: How New Year’s Was Spent
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Wow! Kotori, your outfit is adorable!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Thank you. 𝅘𝅥𝅮 It’s a new sweater I bought for the new year. 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I see. That dusty pink cable knit sweater suits you quite well. 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ehehe. Thanks, but you’re making me blush. Mari-san, where did you go for New Year’s?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I went on vacation to Okinawa.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>That sounds nice. What did you do during your time there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>There were a lot of people swimming on the beach or going shopping, but I think I spent most of my time doing nothing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Huh, you were doing nothing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yes! Taking it easy is a way to spend a vacation. Speaking of which, here’s a souvenir 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Wow, this is so cute~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮 A bracelet with coral charms! Mari-san, thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
